parameters: The hatch is locked from the other side.

As you look at your reflection
a feint shadow appears over your shoulder
does she drink it? we will seee!
Awwww, she didnt get sick... BORING!
The water gave you the plague!
She did it she did it! That gave Rezlo a good chuckle!
